ygData.subject: Re: Details of Meeting Tonight in Chat
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow! What a great idea! - Christina
ygData.messageBody:
Wow! What a great idea!

- Christina

On Wed, 28 Jul 1999, David Lari wrote:
> I will try to send a press release to the Advocate for their cyber column as well
> as XY magazine. But it will take awhile for that to have an effect since they
> have long lead times. In the press release, which I will post here for review
> first, I will mention EQ_Rainbow and the guild.
>
> Anyone else have ideas?
>
> WAMPIR@... wrote:
>
> > From: WAMPIR@...
> >
> > Hello all.
> > One thing I think everyone should know. We only need ten people to get the
> > guild started, and they dont all have to have a player on the same server.
> > Which means that a guild can start basicly on all the servers once it has
> > been approved. Only thing is the guild master has to have a char on the
> > server to petition and get it created. After the guild has been created on a
> > server if the guildmaster doesnt want to be the guildmaster on that server he
> > can hand it off.
> >
> > So what I am basicly saying is. Even thought I dont have the time to play a
> > char on the ber server I will be there tonight to help get the guild started.
> > If David doent want to be the guildmaster on my particular
> > server(bristlebane) I would be happy to take over for him. All he would need
> > to do is start a temp char. Petition for the guild. Then hand it over to me
> > or whom every they want.
> >
> > So if you do not play on the roleplay server please dont fell left out. I am
> > sure when Unity is made. You will quickly see the guild all over.
> >
> > Going on the old 10% rule. There should be almost 2000 GLBT people playing
> > the game. They just are not on this list.
> >
> > Let me know what you think
> >
> > Wampir
> >

> >
> > ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
> > http://www.onelist.com
> > Are you? If not, see our homepage for details.
